text: Polonium-210 remains on the column and does not interfere. Strontium does not form a chloro-complex and therefore passes through in the feed solution and the first stage of the analysis, only the fraction containing lead-210 is collected. The lead is precipitated as the chromate, washed, slurried onto an aluminium counting tray, dried under an infra-red lamp, weighed, and set aside for five days while the bismuth-210 grows in.
handwritten_text: Polonium-210 remains on the column and does not interfere. Strontium does not form a chloro-complex and therefore passes through in the feed solution and the first stage of the analysis, only the fraction containing lead-210 is collected. The lead is precipitated as the chromate, washed, slurried onto an aluminium counting tray, dried under an infra-red lamp, weighed, and set aside for five days while the bismuth-210 grows in.
